name: The Adventures of Explorer Craig
description:
See the world through the eyes of a child who dreams of being a daring explorer that scours through ancient lands for lost treasure, while balancing the mundaneness that is school life.

Originally made for the Brackey's 2022.1 game jam with the "It's not Real" theme (unfortunately missed the deadline by a small amount). This game was done in 7 days solo by me with of course the help of numerous bought assets.

There are some rough edges in this especially those that happened close to the deadline but give it a go none the less if you'd be so kind.
